goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 440 KB)
target_name: Umgehende und bedeutende Maßnahmen ergreifen, um die Verschlechterung der natürlichen Lebensräume zu verringern, dem Verlust der biologischen Vielfalt ein Ende zu setzen und bis 2020 die bedrohten Arten zu schützen und ihr Aussterben zu verhindern
un_custodian_agency: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) BirdLife International (BLI)

en.comparison_sdg: The time series is not compliant with the global metadata, but provides additional information.
en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.target_name: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species
en.un_designated_tier: Tier I
en.un_custodian_agency: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN)
en.source_organisation_1: Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation and Nuclear Safety
en.source_url_text_1: Indicator set of the National Biodiversity Strategy
